nodes.text: Chandrila Star Line, also known as Chandrila Star Lines, was a company that operated luxury cruises in the edges of the galaxy. Promising both comfort and adventure, it brought travelers to the fringes of the Outer Rim Territories from other regions. Chandrila Star Line took passengers to the planet Batuu aboard a Corellian MPO-1400 star cruiser named the Halcyon.
